title: Watch facer - Dripping
summary: Artistic Android Wear watch face. Fully moving animation & Unique design !
description: Features: -Artistic and minimal design style Android Wear watch face.  -A water drop splashes the water every 5 seconds.-Fully moving animation for surface of river .-Supports two degree modes ,Centigrade & Fahrenheit,-Support both round and square watches.This is the most special Android Wear watch face unlike any one you have used before.How long does one second last? When a drop falls into the emerald river, what would come to your mind? Time is like an hourglass, with one side filling up as the other empties. Game could be replayed but time is gone forever. TIME IS PRECIOUS. Definitely different than traditional Facer or Ticker,Supported Devices:Dripping supports all Android Wear smart watches, which include Moto 360, Huawei Watch, LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, TAG Heuer Connected, Fossil Q Founder, Sony Smartwatch3 & Asus ZenWatch.How to use Dripping:-Install the app from Google Play.-Open the Android Wear APP of your phone and select “resync apps”in settings. -Then you could try to select it from Android wear APP , or to long-press you smart watch to choose Dripping. Note:Please rate us positive if you like our work.Don't give us a bad rating too soon if you experienced a problem. Please, send us an email with details, we will be really happy to answer it and fix it as soon as possible.Our Email: magicwatchface@gmail.comSeeing more details please refer the below  “Contact us”Besides, we do really understand sometimes for some reasons our faces might not work well on your watch. DON’T WORRY, If you still don’t know how to set it, please let us know and we will help with it immediately.Or if you just feel not really like this model, please cancel your order within 15 mins and try other magic faces. Tips:✔ Sometimes you need to wait for App to be matched to watch (which might depend on your phone condition and Android Wear version.)✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after installing for a couple of mins, then you could try re-sync it, or follow the below steps:1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone).2. Uninstall the watch face.3. Restart watch and connect to your phone again.4. Finally install the watch face and select “resync apps”in settingsAttention:- ONLY supports Android Wear 5.0 and higher version.More magic faces: Feel free to check out our more watch face collections: https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=magic+watchfaceContact us:If you have any questions or concerns about Magic Watchface please email us:magicwatchface@gmail.comOr join our community: https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/101834176717677614896Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/pages/Magic-watchface/447796408708809Web:http://www.magicwatchface.com/Twitter：https://twitter.com/MagicWatchfaceAnd more coming ways to find us:Instagram, Pinterest... Thank you for :We really appreciate for you downloading our app. We look forward to adding to our free & premium Magic Watchface line.
descriptionHTML:
Features:

-Artistic and minimal design style Android Wear watch face.

-A water drop splashes the water every 5 seconds.

-Fully moving animation for surface of river .

-Supports two degree modes ,Centigrade & Fahrenheit,

-Support both round and square watches.

This is the most special Android Wear watch face unlike any one you have used before.

How long does one second last? When a drop falls into the emerald river, what would come to your mind? Time is like an hourglass, with one side filling up as the other empties. Game could be replayed but time is gone forever. TIME IS PRECIOUS. Definitely different than traditional Facer or Ticker,

Supported Devices:

Dripping supports all Android Wear smart watches, which include Moto 360, Huawei Watch, LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, TAG Heuer Connected, Fossil Q Founder, Sony Smartwatch3 & Asus ZenWatch.

How to use Dripping:

-Install the app from Google Play.
-Open the Android Wear APP of your phone and select “resync apps”in settings.
-Then you could try to select it from Android wear APP , or to long-press you smart watch to choose Dripping.

Note:

Please rate us positive if you like our work.

Don't give us a bad rating too soon if you experienced a problem. Please, send us an email with details, we will be really happy to answer it and fix it as soon as possible.

Our Email: magicwatchface@gmail.com
Seeing more details please refer the below “Contact us”

Besides, we do really understand sometimes for some reasons our faces might not work well on your watch. DON’T WORRY, If you still don’t know how to set it, please let us know and we will help with it immediately.
Or if you just feel not really like this model, please cancel your order within 15 mins and try other magic faces.

Tips:

✔ Sometimes you need to wait for App to be matched to watch (which might depend on your phone condition and Android Wear version.)
✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after installing for a couple of mins, then you could try re-sync it, or follow the below steps:

1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone).
2. Uninstall the watch face.
3. Restart watch and connect to your phone again.
4. Finally install the watch face and select “resync apps”in settings

Attention:
- ONLY supports Android Wear 5.0 and higher version.

More magic faces:
Feel free to check out our more watch face collections:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=magic+watchface

Thank you for :

comments: Love it! This is a great watch face...  Would like to see some more customization options like different colors,  taking off the weather indicator and I would really like to be able to remove the circle outline.

Looks great Can't seem to find any sort of options to use Fahrenheit for weather . in fact there is zero options . would like to see an ability to add watch battery % to this .  other then that very different and unique take . not sure the effect it will have on my moto 360s battery life yet but we will see. If I can get a reply to this comment or my email I'll add the 5th star asap
